title: 多个列的值相加，并可以使用默认值替代

cells.data:
SELECT
   `commission_fxs_one`,
   `commission_fxs_two`,
   `commission_fxs_three`,
   COALESCE(commission_fxs_one, 0) + COALESCE(commission_fxs_two, 0) + COALESCE(commission_fxs_three, 0) AS `fxs_commission` 
FROM
   `lz_orders_item` AS `lz_orders_item` 
WHERE
   (
      `lz_orders_item`.`fxs_one` = 100000044
      OR `lz_orders_item`.`fxs_two` = 100000044
      OR `lz_orders_item`.`fxs_three` = 100000044
   )
   AND `lz_orders_item`.`del` = false 
   AND `lz_orders_item`.`shipper_id` = '0' 
   AND `lz_orders_item`.`kehu_id` = '100000000';
